duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide on-site technical assistance in the installation, repair, preventative maintenance, and operational training of assigned equipment.
Monitor critical accounts and actively participate in support activities for problem resolution.
Install and remove equipment and systems as required.
Manage and perform preventative maintenance on trained equipment.
Work closely with and develop strong business relationships with the customer and client personnel.
Complete all required reporting procedures related to maintenance and repair of the equipment.
Attend training classes to develop necessary knowledge and skills.
Communicate technical and escalated issues to the Regional Service Manager and Technical Service Manager.
Perform weekend work and overtime as needed for installations, service calls, and training.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED equivalent
